dc_title_s: River Crossings: Delaware Valley Regional Planning Commission
dc_description_s: Includes highway and rail river crossing inventory for the DVRPC region.The DVRPC Highway River Crossing data layer was developed to identify key bridges in the region that span major rivers and can be considered crucial to interstate commerce. These bridge were mapped as point features identifying the center point location of the facility. Additional inputs were on the facilities was based on Department of Transportation, Turnpike Commission and Bridge Commission data.The DVRPC Railroad River Crossing data layer was developed to identify key bridges in the region that span major rivers and can be considered crucial to interstate commerce. These bridge were mapped as point features identifying the center point location of the facility. Additional inputs were on the facilities was based on Department of Transportation and rail carrier data.
